front.title: RFC 2544 Applicability Statement: Use on Real-World Networks Considered Harmful

abstract.t: Benchmarking Methodology Working Group (BMWG) has been developing keyperformance metrics and laboratory test methods since 1990, andcontinues this work at present. Recent application of the methodsbeyond their intended scope is cause for concern. This memoclarifies the scope of RFC 2544 and other benchmarking work for theIETF community.
